streets-of-willow.name: Streets of Willow
streets-of-willow.description: The Streets of Willow is a great short track, and local favorite. This track provides a good start for novices, yet gives advance drivers a challenge as well. This is a 1.8 mile road course with 14 turns and three elevation changes, and plenty of run-off space for a safe track going experience.

palomar-mt-sth.name: Palomar Mountain South Grade
palomar-mt-sth.description: The Palomar Mountain South Grade is a winding, steep, and scenic road with numerous sharp switchbacks that provides access to the summit of Palomar Mountain. It is more technical compared to its East Grade brother and accidents may occur if the driver is inattentive.
